body:
With the current master HEAD, the apiserver never gets to a happy state. Here's what gets printed in `apiserver.log` many times.

```
E0722 14:55:52.425200 14134 pod_cache.go:79] Error synchronizing container list: &url.Error{Op:"Get", URL:"http://kubernetes-minion-4.c.first-try-ryfow.internal:10250/healthz", Err:(*net.OpError)(0xc2103ca2c0)}
I0722 14:55:53.228390 14134 log.go:135] GET /api/v1beta1/pods: (126.309321ms) 500
goroutine 3128 [running]:
github.com/GoogleCloudPlatform/kubernetes/pkg/httplog.(*respLogger).WriteHeader(0xc2101e43c0, 0x1f4)
        /var/src/apiserver/src/github.com/GoogleCloudPlatform/kubernetes/pkg/httplog/log.go:154 +0x9c
github.com/GoogleCloudPlatform/kubernetes/pkg/apiserver.(*APIServer).error(0xc2101ce180, 0x7f41e0583a98, 0xc2101447e0, 0x7f41e05842c8, 0xc2101e43c0)
        /var/src/apiserver/src/github.com/GoogleCloudPlatform/kubernetes/pkg/apiserver/apiserver.go:355 +0x3f
github.com/GoogleCloudPlatform/kubernetes/pkg/apiserver.(*APIServer).handleREST(0xc2101ce180, 0xc2101ebcd0, 0x1, 0x1, 0xc210265d00, ...)
        /var/src/apiserver/src/github.com/GoogleCloudPlatform/kubernetes/pkg/apiserver/apiserver.go:429 +0x4cc
github.com/GoogleCloudPlatform/kubernetes/pkg/apiserver.(*APIServer).ServeREST(0xc2101ce180, 0x7f41e05842c8, 0xc2101e43c0, 0xc210265d00)
        /var/src/apiserver/src/github.com/GoogleCloudPlatform/kubernetes/pkg/apiserver/apiserver.go:336 +0x3d8
github.com/GoogleCloudPlatform/kubernetes/pkg/apiserver.*APIServer.ServeREST·fm(0x7f41e05842c8, 0xc2101e43c0, 0xc210265d00)
        /var/src/apiserver/src/github.com/GoogleCloudPlatform/kubernetes/pkg/apiserver/apiserver.go:150 +0x44
net/http.HandlerFunc.ServeHTTP(0xc21022ce50, 0x7f41e05842c8, 0xc2101e43c0, 0xc210265d00)
        /usr/local/go/src/pkg/net/http/server.go:1220 +0x40
net/http.(*ServeMux).ServeHTTP(0xc2101ce0f0, 0x7f41e05842c8, 0xc2101e43c0, 0xc210265d00)
        /usr/local/go/src/pkg/net/http/server.go:1496 +0x163
github.com/GoogleCloudPlatform/kubernetes/pkg/apiserver.(*APIServer).ServeHTTP(0xc2101ce180, 0x7f41e0584290, 0xc210290a00, 0xc210265d00)
        /var/src/apiserver/src/github.com/GoogleCloudPlatform/kubernetes/pkg/apiserver/apiserver.go:315 +0x187
net/http.serverHandler.ServeHTTP(0xc2101eff50, 0x7f41e0584290, 0xc210290a00, 0xc210265d00)
        /usr/local/go/src/pkg/net/http/server.go:1597 +0x16e
net/http.(*conn).serve(0xc2101d6100)
        /usr/local/go/src/pkg/net/http/server.go:1167 +0x7b7
created by net/http.(*Server).Serve
        /usr/local/go/src/pkg/net/http/server.go:1644 +0x28b
```

I think it's due to validation failure on the cadvisor manifest. Here's the relevent section of kubelet.log.

```
I0722 14:49:23.097931 14272 kubelet.go:349] Desired [kubernetes-minion-1.c.first-try-ryfow.internal]: []
I0722 14:49:23.099607 14272 config.go:223] Setting pods for source file : {[{ cadvisor-agent {v1beta2 cadvisor-agent [] [{cadvisor google/cadvisor:latest []  [{http 5000 8080  }] [] 0 0 [{var-run false /var/run  HOST} {var-lib-docker true /var/lib/docker  HOST} {cgroups true /sys/fs/cgroup  HOST}] <nil>}]}}] 0}
W0722 14:49:23.099715 14272 validation.go:200] DEPRECATED: VolumeMount.MountType will be removed. The Volume struct will handle types
W0722 14:49:23.099727 14272 validation.go:200] DEPRECATED: VolumeMount.MountType will be removed. The Volume struct will handle types
W0722 14:49:23.099733 14272 validation.go:200] DEPRECATED: VolumeMount.MountType will be removed. The Volume struct will handle types
W0722 14:49:23.099740 14272 config.go:276] Pod 1 from file failed validation, ignoring: [VolumeMount.Name: not found 'var-run' VolumeMount.Name: not found 'var-lib-docker' VolumeMount.Name: not found 'cgroups']
```
title: cadvisor validation failure
